name: Elementaris - Pre-Alpha (Tower Defense)
description:
Hello, this is a pre alpha of a Tower defense game !

Sorry the game is in french because it's a school project !

When you click on the turrets that you placed you have 3 choice :

Contrôler = control (to control them in first person vew)

Supprimer : Delete

Améliorer : Upgrade

Vague = Wave

WAVE 15 TO WIN

Enjoy !
